A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Things in this movie I liked:
- Snoke's guards
- Old puppet Yoda
- Rey saving the ancient Jedi books
- Mark Hamill's performance
- The "spaceship splitting another spaceship in half" scene
- Set design of the old Rebel Alliance base
- R2-D2

Everything else is terrible. To the point where I'd be here all day trying to explain what I think is wrong with this movie.
